title: Ban Hammer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bonk a player who has the BANNED role, dealing an overkill attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who have the BANNED role cannot become this role.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure all BANNED players are dead.

desc:
Post 5070
*You are banned. Let's keep it that way.*
